verses.text: When \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* a \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, then I \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* him, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\add As\add* they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them, so they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* from \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, and burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

I \w taught|strong="H8637"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* also to \w go|strong="H8637"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* them by their \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*; but they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that I \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* them.

I \w drew|strong="H4900"\w* them with \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, with \w bands|strong="H5688"\w* of \w love|strong="H0160"\w*: and I was to them as they that take \w off|strong="H7311"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* on their \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w*, and I \w laid|strong="H5186"\w* \w meat|strong="H0398"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 11.4 \ft take off: Heb. lift up\f*

¶ He shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, but the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* shall be his \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, because they \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

And the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H2342"\w* on his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and shall \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* his \w branches|strong="H0905"\w*, and \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \add them\add*, because of their own \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w*.

And my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w bent|strong="H8511"\w* to \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* from me: though they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them to the most \w High|strong="H5920"\w*, none at \w all|strong="H3162"\w* would \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \add him\add*.\f + \fr 11.7 \ft none…: Heb. together they exalted not\f*

How shall I give thee \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*? \add how\add* shall I \w deliver|strong="H4042"\w* thee, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? how shall I \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee as \w Admah|strong="H0126"\w*? \add how\add* shall I \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thee as \w Zeboim|strong="H6636"\w*? mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* within me, my \w repentings|strong="H5150"\w* are \w kindled|strong="H3648"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

I will not \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, I will not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: for I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and not \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee: and I will not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

They shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he shall \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* like a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: when he shall \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w tremble|strong="H2729"\w* from the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

They shall \w tremble|strong="H2729"\w* as a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and as a \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*: and I will \w place|strong="H3427"\w* them in their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w compasseth|strong="H5437"\w* me about with \w lies|strong="H3585"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*: but \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* yet \w ruleth|strong="H7300"\w* with \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and is \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* with the \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft saints: or, most holy\f*
